about.title: About me
about.intro: I am a developer passionate about creating unique and functional digital experiences.
about.description: With experience in frontend and backend development, I specialize in creating modern web applications that combine elegant design with clean and efficient code.
about.experienceText: Over 5 years of experience in web development, working with technologies like React, TypeScript, Node.js and more.
